snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Monday's selection includes a security lab's look at the Flame virus's command and control servers, a new use for old keyboards and electronic...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Monday's selection includes a security lab's look at the Flame virus's command and control servers, a new use for old keyboards and electronic devices that look almost good enough to eat.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Tough Viruses and Facebook Addiction
